metadata.title: CVE-2007-4280 asterisk
metadata.description: The Skinny channel driver (chan_skinny) in Asterisk Open Source before 1.4.10, AsteriskNOW before beta7, Appliance Developer Kit before 0.7.0, and Appliance s800i before 1.0.3 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a CAPABILITIES_RES_MESSAGE packet with a capabilities count larger than the capabilities_res_message array population.
